package.name: full_depthimage_to_laserscan
package.description: The full_depthimage_to_laserscan package generates a laserscan from a depth image, similar to the depthimage_to_laserscan package. Due to significant optimization, it is capable of processing an entire depth image in less time than the original package required to process a few rows. It is also capable of filtering out points that lie outside of the specified range of heights.
package.author: Chad Rockey
